attributes.action: Force video sharing websites such as YouTube and Live Leak to remove videos of children fighting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more videos are being posted on sites such as YouTube and Live Leak showing children fighting some showing children being knocked unconscious and showing off weapons. Requests are made to these sites by users for these videos to be removed however the majority of videos are not removed.

The government should force these sites to remove these types of videos without police intervention.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
